definitions.definition: Used to show agreement or acceptance.
examples: Yes , you may go play outside now.
Yes , sir, we have your package right here.

definitions.definition: Used to indicate disagreement or dissent in reply to a negative statement.
examples: It was not my fault we lost the race. Oh, yes , it was!

definitions.definition: Answer to a question presuming one answer when all answers are correct.
examples: Do you like cake, or pie? Yes .

main_definition: Used to show agreement or acceptance.
secondary_definitions: Used to indicate disagreement or dissent in reply to a negative statement.
( humorous ) Answer to a question presuming one answer when all answers are correct.
